title: [Large-Scale] Practice-Based Language Instruction: Effective Pedagogical Strategies Using Smartphone Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational reading comprehension and writing skills
context.additional_context: Practical language acquisition curriculum for limited-technology environments (no PC, smartphone-centric), with formative assessments to monitor learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can produce essential daily conversational expressions with 80% accuracy using educational videos created with smartphones.
Learners can complete basic writing assignments with 70% accuracy by referencing step-by-step video demonstrations.
Learners can propose at least three improvement plans for practical assignments through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
